overview: Pistons (It's A Man's World, Part 1) is Studio 2000's latest prick-packed, testosterone- injected package of passion ready for spring delivery. In the tradition of Studio 2000's legendary Grease Guns, Pistons takes place in an auto body shop where lube, of one kind or another, seems to be on everyone's mind…and hands…and dick… Perhaps the cars waiting for repair are not properly tended to but rest assured cock and ass are tuned up and ready to race. As directed by the bold and brilliant John Travis, Pistons reminds us just how full of cum grease monkeys can be.
title: Pistons: It's A Man's World
